name: Visitor With Resident
description: suburban home front porch, viewed from an elevated vantage point near the front door, looking outward at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A known resident accompanied by an unfamiliar guest. They walk together to the door, resident unlocks and both enter. Static downward-angled viewpoint, wide-angle with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage with sharp details. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion
